page.title: 19BOXFORD SCHOOL Cont.
page.content:
Lessons are from 8.45 p.m. to 3.15 p.m. with an hour's lunch break. A new system for school meals has been introduced called the "Star Choice". The children can chose between three main courses and three desserts. The meals are served on moulded trays.
In addition to the daily curriculum, children have the opportunity to take part, at lunchtimes or after school, in the following activities: country dancing, creative dancing, maypole dancing, recorder lessons, violin lessons, Brownies, choir, cycling proficiency, squash and occasionally tennis.
